title: Manage Component Rebuild Program
description: A maintenance planner manages the program for rebuilding major components (like haul truck engines) to be swapped into the fleet.

tasks.description: Review the forward forecast of component change-outs to determine how many rebuilt engines will be needed in the next six months.
tasks.expected_outcome: The forecast shows a need for four rebuilt engines.

tasks.description: Check the current inventory of rebuilt engines in the warehouse.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system shows only one rebuilt engine is currently in stock.

tasks.description: Issue work orders to the workshop to rebuild three used engines that are waiting to be repaired.
tasks.expected_outcome: Work orders are created to rebuild the components, ensuring a sufficient supply of rotables for the fleet.
